page.title: 07Churches in Springfield
page.content: In our area there are three new churches.The oldest of these three churches is North Springfield Baptist Church which was opened in Jan 1984 by the president of the Baptist Churches in England.Besides the church services they run youth groups,Boys and Girls Brigade and Playgroups.The 2nd church is St Augustines.It is an interdenominational church used by the Roman Catholics, Church of England and Methodists.It was consecrated in June 1984.The church is also used as a hall.St Augustines is very plain and does not really look like a church. Since the first houses were built 8 years ago{Chelmer Village}has not had a church.In 1982 the first plans for a new church built on land given by a local farmer were made.{The Church of {Our Saviour}will be dedicated on{19th {July,1985.
